location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘MAP SHOWING COAST AND PORTS OF OMAN’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on tracing clothDimensions:325 x 195 mm, on sheet 333 x 290 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Coastline between Ras Mussendam (Musandam) and Ras El Hadd (Ras Al Hadd) shown in red with grid added in pencil.Tracing produced from Mr. Bower’s map which was requested by Lieutenant Colonel F.B. Prideaus, in letter dated 19th October 1925, in order to compare it with the map accompanied Alban’s confidential D.O. No. 58 of the 23rd September 1925.
